author: Amarnath Tewary
text:
Prashant Kishor, who has been credited with planning and implementing the election campaign of the Nitish Kumar-led grand alliance in the 2015 Assembly poll, has been appointed adviser to the Chief Minister. He has been accorded the status of a State Cabinet Minister.

According to a notification issued late on Thursday night by the State Cabinet Coordination Committee, Mr.Kishor would advise Chief Minister Nitish Kumar on policies, planning and programme implementation related to the State’s development.

Mr.Kishor, 37, a native of Bihar’s Buxar district, played a key role in the poll campaign strategy of the grand alliance which notched up an impressive victory with 178 seats out of the total 243 in its kitty.
title: Ace poll strategist is adviser to Nitish
